suite.name: Hltv Sign In

test.name: Check For Username And Password Input Fields

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://www.hltv.org/
No browser and context was open. New browser and context was automatically opened when page is created.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector //div[@id="CybotCookiebotDialog"] at state visible

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Get Element State
kw.doc: Get the given state from the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Get Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the HTML ``attribute`` of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'testUser' in the given field.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.
